name: Meat Loaf
description: A classic comfort food dish made with ground meat and seasonings.
instructions: 2. In a large bowl, combine ground beef, breadcrumbs, diced onion, beaten egg, ketchup, milk, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper.
3. Form the mixture into a loaf shape and place in a baking dish.
4. Spread ketchup over the top of the meatloaf.
5. Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour or until fully cooked.
6. Let it rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.
